trends: There has been one other sighting in Forest City
There were no other sightings in Forest City on or around August 14th 2013
divs: sighting details08\14\2013 i was standing outside in the driveway on the phone with a friend. it was approximately around 10p.m.ish. i noticed a beam of light coming from behind the house up in the sky. it was moving somewhat slowly then was out of sight. it was a bright white\yellowish light beaming across the sky the it just remained still in a straight line. didn't move or anything. i thought it was the strangest thing i had ever seen. i told my friend on the phone go outside check it out. so, she did and didn't see it. i said it's directly above my head in a straight line up in the sky. i kept saying what is that and where is coming from? she couldn't see it and then she got off the phone with me. i kept staring at the light trying to figure out what it was and where it was coming from. i thought for a second maybe its a meteror shower still but then again they said it was on the 12th and 13th. i tried to take a picture from my cell phone and it was just blurred light. so, i deleted it and tried take it again. still wouldn't turn out. so, i gave up. then i went inside when i came back outside about 5mins later it was gone. like it disappeared.
Summary: I was standing outside in the driveway talking on the phone with a friend when I noticed a beam of light moving somewhat slowly across the sky. It was big thick line going straight across. Then just stayed there in the sky for about 10mins
